data.eml:eml: An opiine Braconidae (Hymenoptera) reared from Richardiidae (Diptera) and recognition of a new species group of Opius s. l.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wharton, Robert, Daniels, Sophia, Shirley, Xanthe, Restuccia, Danielle (2013): An opiine Braconidae (Hymenoptera) reared from Richardiidae (Diptera) and recognition of a new species group of Opius s. l. ZooKeys 289: 65-101, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.289.4900, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.289.4900
